criteria.details: Score: 0.00 - The response does not identify that Operating Cash Flow (row 64 in BS & CFS) is missing the adjustment for finance costs, net. This is a core structural error and was completely missed.
Score: 0.00 - There is no mention of the rogue -10 value in cell K32 of the FS Calcs sheet. The analyst did not reference this cell or any unexplained hard-coded value.
Score: 0.00 - The analyst failed to identify that row 70 in BS & CFS is missing the addition of PPE including leases (row 66). This specific PPE linkage error was not discussed.
